modShortDescription: This mod increases the number of mod slots that each weapon/tool has, by 1 per level. Tier 1 = 1 Mod Slot, Tier 6 = 6 Mod Slots.
modDescription:
This mod increases the number of mod slots that each weapon/tool has, by 1 per level. Tier 1 = 1 Mod Slot, Tier 6 = 6 Mod Slots. Also, check out his [Trader Tier Reward System](https://7daystodiemods.com/trader-tier-reward-system/).

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=18XBPhCy4lqwJ79_oDGjKiXASsmLvMhn8)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20645-epicspires-quality-modslot-boost/).

**Credits:** [EpicSpire](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/epicspire/)
